patient_visible_data.chief_complaint: Recurrent abdominal pain and obstructive symptoms
patient_visible_data.presenting_symptoms: Long-standing Crohn's disease with recent recurrence of obstructive symptoms. Colonoscopy reveals inflammatory stenosis at anastomosis site.
